column4: well i got a glimpse of the login screen before and then it disappeard
well it aint even showing.. i got a glimpse 0.1 sec like and the screen goes blac
but that was the only time i got a glimpse of it
its right after bootup is done and its loading in Loginscreen
its not cause i am not "useing" it or makeing movements on the screen
You do get the text mode to work?
i had a simmillar problem once. Had to edit my xorg.conf and change my grapichs driver
ok. what did you have to do the the Conf ?
i have a gforce 6600GT and had to change the "driver" section from nv to nvidia , had to sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx first though
well :) i think thats the problem
try sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx and then edit your xorg.conf and replace nv with nvidia. Then restart x
then tell me how it goes
